title: Income Tax (European Investment Bank) (Approval and Exemption) Order, 2014
content:
Supplement to the Republic of Zambia Government 153
Gazette dated Monday, 13th October, 2014
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 56 OF 2014
The Income Tax Act
(Laws, Volume 19, Cap. 323)
The Income Tax (European Investment Bank) (Approval
and Exemption) Order, 2014
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section fifteen of the
Income Tax Act, the following Order is made:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Income Tax (European Title and
Investment Bank) (Approval and Exemption) Order, 2014. commence-
ment
(2) This Order shall be deemed to have come into operation
on 10th October, 2014.
2. The European Investment Bank is an approved organisation Approval of
for purposes of exemption from tax with respect to the Agreement international
organisation
specified in the Schedule.
3. The income earned, including interest, fees and commission, Exemption
by the organisation approved in paragraph 2 and accruing under from tax
the Agreement specified in the Schedule shall be exempt from tax
pursuant to subparagraph (5) of paragraph 5 of Part III of the
Second Schedule to the Act.
SCHEDULE
(Paragraph 2)
AGREEMENT
The Partnership Agreement between the members of the African, Caribbean
and Pacific group of States of the one part and the European Community and its
Member States of the other part, signed in Cotonou on 23rd June, 2000.
A. B. CHIKWANDA,
LUSAKA Minister of Finance
13th October, 2014
[MF/IDM.101/24/61]
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101, Lusaka, Price K2.00 each
154 Statutory Instruments 13th October, 2014
